original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁ta haṃ ▁ta haṃ ▁olokent ā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchanti ▁pe
▁ o kkhitta cakkhu ▁ antara ghar e ▁gam issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁ o kkhitta cakkhu nā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gantabb aṃ ▁ yug amattaṃ ▁ pekkh antena

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokento antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ta haṃ ▁ta haṃ ▁olokent o ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
